languages.text: "Смири эмоции, ибо гнев лишь застилает тебе глаза".

traits.locale_text: "Смири эмоции, ибо гнев лишь застилает тебе глаза".

languages.text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."
languages.original_text: "Смири эмоции, ибо гнев лишь застилает тебе глаза".

traits.locale_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your eyes."
"Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your eyes."
"Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."
"Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."
"Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."

languages.text: « Modérez vos élans. La colère ne fait qu'obscurcir votre jugement. »
languages.original_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."

traits.locale_text: « Modérez vos élans. La colère ne fait qu'obscurcir votre jugement. »

languages.text: “克制你的情绪，愤怒只会遮蔽你的视线。”
languages.original_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."

traits.locale_text: “克制你的情绪，愤怒只会遮蔽你的视线。”

languages.text: "Zügelt Eure Emotionen. Wut trübt nur Eure Sicht."
languages.original_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."

traits.locale_text: "Zügelt Eure Emotionen. Wut trübt nur Eure Sicht."

languages.text: «Mantén la compostura. El odio solo te acabará cegando».
languages.original_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."

traits.locale_text: «Mantén la compostura. El odio solo te acabará cegando».

languages.text: 「感情を抑えよ。怒りは視界を曇らせるだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."

traits.locale_text: 「感情を抑えよ。怒りは視界を曇らせるだけだ」

languages.text: "Duygularına hâkim ol. Öfke ancak gözünü karartır."
languages.original_text: "Restrain your emotions. Anger only serves to cloud your sight."
